item.title: Software Migration Tips (Python 3 Edition)
item.description: In this post I’d like to share some tips in regard to migrating a fairly complex software system to a new version of the programming language in which it has been originally written in. Most of the advice will be based on and related to the migration from Python 2 to Python 3 as this is probably the most likely migration process you can encounter in your near-future software career and it also happens to be the process I have the most experience with.
